Package wctc.advancedjava.lab.DiscountStrategy

Interface Summary
DiscountStrategy Interface for abstracting the discount details from a product.
ReceiptFormatStrategy Interface to define behavior for formatting output.
 

Class Summary
BuyOneGetOneDiscount Buy one get one free discount.
CashRegister The CashRegister class manages the customer transactions, but is simply an input/output device.
Customer The Customer class hold information about the customer making the purchase.
CustomerDb Pseudo database for holding Customer records.
FlatDiscount Flat rate discount if total purchase is over a certain dollar amount.
LineItem The LineItem class does the work of gathering product information from the product, and input information regarding the transcation in order to store information about the cost, discount, etc.
NoDiscount No discount at all.
PercentageDiscount Percentage discount off of product.
Product The Product class holds information about each product and its associated Discount strategy.
ProductDb Pseudo database for holding Product records.
QuantityDiscount Discount received after purchasing so many of one item.
Receipt The Receipt class hold the "invoice" information about the sale, but is more like the container for which all the sale/transactional information sits in.
ReceiptFormat1 Formats receipt output (format 1) for a purchase.
ReceiptFormat2 Formats receipt output (format 2) for a purchase.
Startup The Startup class provides all the input for the Point-of-Sale program demonstrating the (Discount) Strategy pattern.
